ch.nolix.element.GUI

Class BorderWidgetLook<BWL extends BorderWidgetLook<BWL>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.entity2.Entity<WL>
      • ch.nolix.element.GUI.WidgetLook<BWL>
        • ch.nolix.element.GUI.BackgroundWidgetLook<BWL>
          • ch.nolix.element.GUI.BorderWidgetLook<BWL>
  • Type Parameters:
    BWL - The type of a BorderWidgetLook.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Castable, IFluentObject<BWL>, ISmartObject<BWL>, Listable<BWL>, TypeRequestable, Resettable<BWL>, Specifiable<BWL>, Specified
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccordionLook, ConsoleLook, FloatContainerLook, GridLook, ImageWidgetLook, SelectionMenuLook, SingleContainerLook, StackLook, TabContainerLook, TextLineWidgetLook, WidgetGUILook

    public abstract class BorderWidgetLook<BWL extends BorderWidgetLook<BWL>>
extends BackgroundWidgetLook<BWL>
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
